author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...BERYL WEAKENING AS IT MOVES FARTHER INLAND OVER THE NORTHEASTERN YUCATAN PENINSULA... ...DANGEROUS HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS, STORM SURGE, AND DAMAGING WAVES EXPECTED OVER PORTIONS OF THIS AREA FOR A FEW MORE HOURS...
summary:
...BERYL WEAKENING AS IT MOVES FARTHER INLAND OVER THE NORTHEASTERN YUCATAN PENINSULA... ...DANGEROUS HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS, STORM SURGE, AND DAMAGING WAVES EXPECTED OVER PORTIONS OF THIS AREA FOR A FEW MORE HOURS...
 As of 10:00 AM CDT Fri Jul 5
 the center of Beryl was located near 20.7, -88.3
 with movement WNW at 16 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 980 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Beryl (AT2/AL022024)
